Diets fail because they rely on willpower. SlowCarb works because it replaces willpower with simple rules. No calorie counting, no starving, no confusion. Just follow 5 rules and eat until you're full. The result: 8 to 10 kg in 6 weeks, without the gym.
No calculations. No supplements. Just follow these rules and eat until you're full.
No bread, pasta, rice, potatoes, or sugar. No exceptions during the week.
Eat at least 30 grams of protein within 30 minutes of waking up to kickstart your metabolism.
Drink water, coffee, and tea. No soda, fruit juice, milk, or alcohol (except on cheat day).
Fructose slows fat burning. Avocado and tomato are allowed in limited amounts.
Beans, lentils, and chickpeas provide lasting energy and keep you full.
One day per week you eat whatever you want. This is not optional. It resets your hormones and makes the diet sustainable.
Everything to start today and keep going. No loose ends.

Log your weight and see the trend. Nothing motivates like a line going down.
